column3: str
Welcome, Blade <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>. If you believe your exploits on the battlefield have proven your mettle and are worthy of evaluation, I would hear of them.
That is, of course, assuming you have exploits to report. If you are even half the soldier they say you are, I look forward to your return, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>.
Ah, Blade <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>. What news from the front lines?
What will you do?
Offer proof of your mettle.
Ask about Resistance ranks.
Nothing.

Thank you for your report, Blade <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>, but it was wholly unnecessary. I daresay there is not a soldier in all the Resistance unaware of your courageous deeds.
I see... Not the most compelling of reports, but certainly deserving of recognition.
You must raise your mettle by <Format(IntegerParameter(1),FF022C)/> for promotion to the next Resistance rank.
Were there not other soldiers to account for it, I would believe your report a work of fiction.
The troops will no doubt be inspired when they hear of your accomplishments. I look forward to hearing more of your continued success in the field.
A new Resistance quest is now available.
A new Resistance quest is now available in Zadnor.
Ah, before you go. I am pleased to report our quartermaster has seen fit to expand your lost finds holster. I trust you will put our additional stock of resources to good use.

I should also mention that research on the forgotten fragments is proceeding apace, and our appraisers are confident they can identify a greater variety of fragments. I pray they will be of use to you in battle.

From what our scouts have told me, the fighting grows fiercer, more desperate with each passing day. I have no doubt you have dealt with such overwhelming odds before, but I would remind you to stay vigilant. There is no telling what they have planned.
When fighting at Resistance rank <Value>IntegerParameter(1)</Value> or higher, incapacitation will result in a loss of mettle.
Furthermore, the use of Return after incapacitation will incur an additional penalty to mettle. The penalty incurred will vary depending on your Resistance rank.
If you have nothing else to report, I will not keep you. I pray you stay safe out there, Blade <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>.
If you have nothing else to report, I will not keep you. Unless, of course, there is more to tell of your endeavors on the front lines?
Do you have more to report?
Hah, I suspected as much. Well, let's have it then.
Understood. I look forward to your next report, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>.
By the gods. I would think such feats impossible were they boasted by any other.
On behalf of the Resistance, I extend to you my humblest thanks. With you at our side, hope for a free Bozja shall never be lost.
